title: get_batch_by_id_response_body
description: A get batch by id response body

allOf.title: batch
allOf.description:
Batches are an advanced feature of ShipEngine designed for users who need to generate hundreds or
thousands of labels at a time.

allOf.title: label_layout
allOf.description: The available layouts (sizes) in which shipping labels can be downloaded.  The label format determines which sizes are supported.  `4x6` is supported for all label formats, whereas `letter` (8.5" x 11") is only supported for `pdf` format.

allOf.title: label_format
allOf.description:
The possible file formats in which shipping labels can be downloaded. We recommend `pdf` format because it is supported by all carriers, whereas some carriers do not support the `png` or `zpl` formats. |Label Format | Supported Carriers |--------------|----------------------------------- |`pdf` | All carriers |`png` | `fedex`
`stamps_com`
`ups`
`usps` |`zpl` | `access_worldwide`
`apc`
`asendia`
`dhl_global_mail`
`dhl_express`
`dhl_express_australia`
`dhl_express_canada`
`dhl_express_worldwide`
`dhl_express_uk`
`dpd`
`endicia`
`fedex`
`fedex_uk`
`firstmile`
`globegistics`
`imex`
`newgistics`
`ontrac`
`rr_donnelley`
`stamps_com`
`ups`
`usps`

allOf.title: se_id
allOf.description: A string that uniquely identifies a ShipEngine resource, such as a carrier, label, shipment, etc.

batch_id.description: A string that uniquely identifies the batch

external_batch_id.description: A string that uniquely identifies the external batch

batch_notes.description: Custom notes you can add for each created batch

allOf.title: date_time
allOf.description: An [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) string that represents a date and time.

created_at.description: The date and time the batch was created in ShipEngine

allOf.title: date_time
allOf.description: An [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) string that represents a date and time.

processed_at.description: The date and time the batch was processed in ShipEngine

errors.description: The number of errors that occurred while generating the batch

warnings.description: The number of warnings that occurred while generating the batch

completed.description: The number of labels generated in the batch

forms.description: The number of forms for customs that are available for download

count.description: The total of errors, warnings, and completed properties

allOf.title: optional_link
allOf.description: A link to a related resource, or an empty object if there is no resource to link to

allOf.title: url
allOf.description: A URL

href.description: The URL of the linked resource, if any

type.description: The type of resource, or the type of relationship to the parent resource

allOf.description: A URL

pdf.description: The URL for the pdf generated label
